title: Background is entirely black during the loading screen consequently leading to a Network Warning.
body:
An issue I've recently noticed within my client is that once the pick/ban phase transitions into the loading screen, the background to the loading screen is completely engulfed in black while only the red & blue borders of players remain visible. After 10 seconds, I will receive a network warning that alerts me with issues concerning my connection. When I reconnect, the same event will re-occur 3 or 2 times before properly connecting me to the game.

This issue is most likely stated and resolved on the Riot Support page however I cannot find it.

Your help is greatly appreciated.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having a bit of a hiccup when it's trying to establish that first initial link with the game servers. It may take a little troubleshooting to get to the bottom of it, but let's start by checking out some of your network settings with this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Work your way through each step, and make sure to test it in a custom game to avoid any possible penalties.
